mapper.insert: insert into new_cloud_scm.scm_settlement( id, tenant_id, store_id, supplier_id, settlement_type, settlement_code, settlement_amount, paid_amount, to_be_paid_amount, bill_status, store_status, pay_status, cash_status, check_user, check_time, check_remark, obsolete_res, return_res, file_url, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, delete_flag, ext_info, version, remark ) values( #{id}, #{tenantId}, #{storeId}, #{supplierId}, #{settlementType}, #{settlementCode}, #{settlementAmount}, #{paidAmount}, #{toBePaidAmount}, #{billStatus}, #{storeStatus}, #{payStatus}, #{cashStatus}, #{checkUser}, #{checkTime}, #{checkRemark}, #{obsoleteRes}, #{returnRes}, #{fileUrl}, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime}, #{deleteFlag}, #{extInfo}, #{version}, #{remark} );
